title: MongoDB Interview Preparation
subject: MongoDB
theory: Deep dive into theoretical concepts often asked in system design interviews. Why NoSQL? When to choose MongoDB over Postgres?

interview_questions.question: Explain CAP theorem in context of MongoDB.
interview_questions.answer: MongoDB is CP (Consistent & Partition Tolerant). During a partition, it sacrifices Availability (writes stop if primary is lost) to preserve Consistency.

exam_notes: Eventual consistency possible with read pref secondary.
summary: Preparing for the 'Why' questions is as important as the 'How'.
